faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Quick answers to the most common questions about DataChat.

items.q: I see “Unauthorized (invalid JWT)”. What do I do?
items.a: Your session expired. Log out and sign in again from the Login page.

items.q: How do I connect to MySQL?
items.a: Open the Connection panel, choose MySQL, and paste a valid SQLAlchemy URL (e.g., mysql+pymysql://user:pass@host:3306/db).

items.q: How do I query an Excel file?
items.a: Choose Excel, enter the server-visible path (e.g., C:/data/employees.xlsx), select a sheet, and then ask your question.

items.q: Why do I get “Error contacting the backend”?
items.a: The API may be down or blocked by CORS. Ensure the FastAPI server is running and CORS allows http://localhost:5173.

items.q: How do I change the app language?
items.a: Use the language selector in the top bar or in the Connection panel. Your choice is saved automatically.
By default we limit results (e.g., max_rows: 200). You can adjust this in the request options.
